name: A little Tale of Nonsense, Pizza and Gold
name_original: A little Tale of Nonsense, Pizza and Gold
description:
Hi Guys,

hope you have at least a bit of fun with my little adventure. At least I had a lot of fun developing it, even if I have to admit I underestimated the workload and got quite under pressure in the end - but it was a great experience for my first jam :-)

There might be bugs. In case you can't move anymore (or anything else), just, uhm...kill yourself. In the game. The player. Also I can only hope all dialog leads to something, hah.

There are two different endings, and yea most of the dialog is relatively unique, soooo it ABSOLUTELY is worth playing about 100 hours. At least ;-)

Free Assets used:

Ansimuz Sunnyland Assets
Cainos Pixel Art Platformer
Brackeys 2D Mega Pack
Sound Effects from freesound.org
Also inspired by Brackes GameJam Date Night Title

-> All converted to Black and White

Paid Assets used:

Pixelcrushers Dialogue System (use this if you have dialog in your game!)
Mirza Beig Effects Pack
Music all by Dark Fantasy Studio

Thanks for playing!
